channel.title: Tooling on Apache Camel
channel.description: Recent content in Tooling on Apache Camel

item.title: Upgrading to Camel 3.0.0 with Windup
item.description: We’ll show you how Windup can help you plan and estimate your upgrade to Camel 3

item.title: Language Support for Apache Camel - VS Code extension 0.0.20
item.description: During the past months, several noticeable new features have been added to improve the developer experience of application based on Apache Camel. These updates are available in the 0.0.20 release of Visual Studio (VS) Code extension. Before going into the list of updates in detail, I want to note that I mentioned in the title the VS Code Extension release because VS Code extension is covering the broader set of new features.
